subjects_num.Description: Number of subjects in this source dataset

sessions_num.Description: Total number of sessions across all subjects, or 'n/a' if single-session

sessions_min.Description: Minimum number of sessions per subject, or 'n/a' if single-session

sessions_max.Description: Maximum number of sessions per subject, or 'n/a' if single-session

bold_num.Description: Total number of BOLD fMRI files in this source dataset

t1w_num.Description: Total number of T1-weighted structural files in this source dataset

t2w_num.Description: Total number of T2-weighted structural files in this source dataset

bold_size.Description: Total size of BOLD files in this source dataset

t1w_size.Description: Total size of T1w files in this source dataset

bold_size_max.Description: Size of largest BOLD file in this source dataset

bold_duration_total.Description: Total BOLD acquisition duration across all subjects (sum of TR Ã— volumes)

bold_duration_mean.Description: Mean BOLD run duration, weighted by number of runs per subject

bold_voxels_total.Description: Total number of voxels across all BOLD files in this source dataset

bold_voxels_mean.Description: Mean voxels per BOLD file, weighted by duration

datatypes.Description: Comma-separated list of BIDS datatypes present (e.g., 'anat,func,dwi')
